content:
Bo LIANG is a research assistant in HK PolyU whose supervisor is Prof. Harry QIN, Full Professor of Sch. of Nursing, HK PolyU.
Before that, he worked as a research assistant in Dept. of Computer Science, HKBU, as a member of HKBU Visual Computing Group under the supervision of Dr. Jie CHEN, Assistant Professor in Dept. of Computer Science, HKBU.
His research interests include 3D human reconstruction & animation, 3D scene reconstruction, neural rendering and deep learning.
